law.catch_line: On or before April 1, 2012, the Commissioner shall issue a report on the information provided to the...

section.section: On or before April 1, 2012, the Commissioner shall issue a report on the information provided to the Commissioner under § 30-102 of this title.

The report required under this section shall:
contain the names of any slaveholders or slaves provided under § 30-102 of this title; and
include a copy of each document provided to the Commissioner under § 30-102 of this title.
The report required under this section shall be made available to the public.
The Commissioner shall make a copy of the report available on the website of the Administration.

text.section: The Commissioner shall provide a copy of the report required under this section to the Governor and, in accordance with § 2-1246 of the State Government Article, the General Assembly.
A copy of the report shall be maintained at the Thurgood Marshall Law Library at the University of Maryland School of Law.
